#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
stack<int>s;
ll tentofive(ll n)
{
	ll i=0,a,b=0, power = 1;
while(n!=0)
{
	a=n%5;
     b=b+a*power;
     power *=10;
	i++;n=n/5;
	
}
return b;
}
int main()
{
ll t,n,arr[10000],i,k,a;cin>>t;while(t--)
{
cin>>k;if(k==1)cout<<0<<endl;
else
{
ll temp=tentofive(k-1);ll j;//cout<<temp<<endl;
while(temp!=0)
{
	i=temp%10;
	i=i*2;
	s.push(i);
	temp=temp/10;
}
while(!s.empty())
{
	ll x=s.top();
	s.pop();
	cout<<x;
}cout<<endl;}}}
